content.text: Match ends, Newcastle United 3, Chelsea 0.
Second Half ends, Newcastle United 3, Chelsea 0.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by N'Golo Kanté.
Foul by Isaac Hayden (Newcastle United).
Andreas Christensen (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Massadio Haidara replaces Mohamed Diamé.
Foul by Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United).
N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Chelsea. Tiemoué Bakayoko tries a through ball, but Victor Moses is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro.
Substitution, Chelsea. Pedro replaces Eden Hazard.
Attempt missed. Joselu (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ayoze Pérez.
Offside, Chelsea. César Azpilicueta tries a through ball, but Álvaro Morata is caught offside.
Substitution, Chelsea. Willian replaces Ross Barkley.
Substitution, Chelsea. Álvaro Morata replaces Olivier Giroud.
Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea).

Victor Moses (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Paul Dummett (Newcastle United).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match DeAndre Yedlin (Newcastle United) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Victor Moses with a cross.
Attempt missed. Victor Moses (Chelsea) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box misses to the left.
Foul by Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United).
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Newcastle United 3, Chelsea 0. Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Florian Lejeune following a set piece situation.
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).
Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea).
Attempt saved. Ross Barkley (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by César Azpilicueta.
Goal!  Newcastle United 2, Chelsea 0. Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jonjo Shelvey.
Attempt blocked. Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Martin Dubravka.

Substitution, Newcastle United. Joselu replaces Dwight Gayle because of an injury.
Foul by Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United).
Emerson (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
